text: Opfikon is a municipality and city in the district of Bülach in the canton of Zurich in Switzerland. ==Villages== Opfikon, Glattbrugg and Oberhausen. ==Economy== Adecco S.A., the world's largest employment agency, is headquartered in Glattbrugg. ==Gallery== File:Opfikon01.jpg|Opfikon File:Glatt - Glattbrugg IMG 6859.jpg|Glattbrugg File:Adecco.HQ.jpg|Adecco ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of the town of Opfikon * Category:Municipalities in Bülach Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Opfikon
